DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double blind , placebo-controlled study effect intranasal oxytocin obese adult , age 18-45 year old . Subjects randomized receive intranasal oxytocin placebo ( 3 spray per nostril , 4 time per day ) 8 week . Study visit include screen determine eligibility , 2-part baseline visit , visit every 2 week thereafter week 14 , safety follow-up visit 6 week last dose study drug . Study procedure include behavioral , metabolic , neuroimaging , endocrine assessment .
